body.name: All-New Blink Outdoor 4 Floodlight Camera – Wire-free smart security camera, 700 lumens, two-year battery life, HD live view, enhanced motion detection, Works with Alexa- 1 camera system
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 1 hr 16 mins
features: Illuminate your home with Blink Outdoor 4 Floodlight Camera featuring 700 lumens of motion-triggered LED lighting, HD live view, wire-free install, and real-time alerts for your peace of mind.
See and speak from the Blink app — Experience 1080p HD live view, infrared night vision, and crisp two-way audio.
Two-year battery life — Get up to two years of power with the included batteries.
Set up in minutes — No drill option available with the included kit.
Enhanced motion detection — Be alerted to motion faster from your smartphone with dual-zone, enhanced motion detection.
Person detection — Receive alerts when a person is detected with embedded computer vision (CV) as part of an optional Blink Subscription Plan (sold separately).
Save and share clips — Choose to store events in the cloud with a free 30-day trial of the Blink Subscription Plan or locally with the Sync Module 2 (included) and a USB drive (sold separately).
Works with Alexa – Connect your camera to an Alexa-enabled device to stream live video, arm and disarm, activate lights, and more using your voice.
Includes one Outdoor 4 Floodlight Camera, one Sync Module 2, two AA lithium metal batteries, four D Cell batteries, one mounting kit, one power adapter, and one USB cable.

productInformation.name: Size
productInformation.value: Camera: 70 x 70 x 41 mm Floodlight: 262 x 137 x 97 mm Sync Module: 62 x 59 x 18 mm

productInformation.name: Power
productInformation.value: Camera: Two AA 1.5V lithium metal (non-rechargeable) batteries Sync Module 2: 5V DC power adapter Floodlight: Four D cell 1.5V alkaline batteries Battery life of up to two years is based on default settings. Battery life will vary based on device settings, use, and environmental factors.

productInformation.name: Wifi connectivity
productInformation.value: High-speed internet connection (such as Broadband, Fiber, or DSL). Wireless network: 2.4 GHz 802.11b/g/n.

productInformation.name: Included in the box
productInformation.value: Includes one Outdoor 4 Floodlight Camera, one Sync Module 2, two AA lithium metal batteries, four D Cell batteries, one mounting kit, one power adapter, and one USB cable.

productInformation.name: Warranty and service
productInformation.value: 1-year limited warranty included. Purchase and use of Blink cameras are subject to the terms found here.

productInformation.name: Support
productInformation.value: Click here to view the Blink support page.

productInformation.name: Generation
productInformation.value: Camera: 4th Generation - 2023 release Floodlight: 2nd Generation - 2023 release

productInformation.name: Software security updates
productInformation.value: This device receives guaranteed software security updates until at least four years after the device is last available for purchase as a new unit on our websites.

productInformation.name: Cloud video storage
productInformation.value: To keep videos beyond your trial, subscribe to a Blink Subscription Plan which allows videos to be stored in the cloud for up to 60 days. See Blink Subscription Plans for more information about your plan’s retention period. To keep important videos beyond this period, download them to your mobile device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up
reviews.reviewText: Out of box to installed a half hour..just don't forget if you install during the day the lights won't come on until dark unless you change the setting, work great, bright and easy seet uo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with no issues
reviews.reviewText: The install was very easy. It came with a Blink module but I was able to use my existing module which is at least 40 ft away with no issues. Using the blink app I'm able to connect to camera in seconds. Plenty if light from the camera to get clear pictures and video at night. Not sure about battery life since I've only had it for a few weeks. I currently have multiple blink indoor and outdoor cameras and batteries typically last for 6 to 8 months depending on usage. No issues with wireless connectivity. And for me it's a must to have the Blink cloud storage for easy retrieval of video. Im very satisfied with my purchase so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Can See Everything From Singapore/Philippines
reviews.reviewText: It is wonderful to know my home is safe while I'm working overseas. The peace of mind that it gives me is immeasurable. The camera is crisp and works very well in daylight or at night. I would recommend this floodlight camera for your home. However, the camera is only as good as your settings. It will take time to get the alert zones and video length of time to your liking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The floodlight is a HUGE game changer. It doesn’t pick up wildly far, and we have the motion set as high as possible, but it picks up everything from people walking towards our porch, to bunnies in the yard. There’s a bit of a delay when you want to watch the live view, but that’s usually for any Blink camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Am really liking the floodlight as it is bright when lights up and can see if anything is around. Good security light, setup was easy to install, works like a charm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Their tech support is excellent
reviews.reviewText: This is our third Blink camera. Unfortunately, we were having an issue with the lights not triggering. Their online documentation wasn't helpful. We called tech support and got excellent help from the representative, who determined there was an equipment issue. They sent a replacement light set and the camera is working fine now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy setup and feel safe
reviews.reviewText: This is great. Got some weirdo in my neighborhood and I needed to make sure I could see the side of the house. The camera is clear and I like the fact that I can set the length of recording time. I’ve already seen people walking through the backyard on their way elsewhere but not bothering anything—but I was impressed by the clarity of the camera. Worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love my blink cameras need to work on battery efficiency
reviews.reviewText: The floodlight is very good security system for your home. Only thing is that the batteries only last a week having it on battery, efficient and solar pics on it. I’m not that good even though I live in Texas where it’s sunny all the time.
